channel.title: Posts on ERIC WANG
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ERIC WANG

item.title: @MINISTRY OF ENVIRONMENT - What is data science at the national level ?
item.description: Central french administration is a great opportunity to have a macro view of how to drive ideas to reality. Combine it with the experience of local administration, and you reinforce thinking to lead and design digital tools for answers. I design and produce data insight into public policy evaluation.

item.title: @MINISTRY OF ENVIRONMENT - How to urban plan with data science ?
item.description: At the ministry of Environment and more especially at the local administration of Val d'Oise department, I learn to manage and to tackle local housing policy.

item.title: @MINISTRY OF INTERIOR - How to graphic design at the ministry of interior ?
item.description: At the ministry of Interior and more specically at the Border Police, I produce quantity of infographics to highlight weekly report for the ministry cabinet.

item.title: @FREELANCE - How to deal with the preparation of a seminary at COP21 after a dreadful event ?
item.description: One of the two services provided is to assist for the implementation of a corporate philanthropy research policy for a Global Youth Climate Pact for a cluster of research Center including CNRS - National Center for Scientific Research which leed to a seminary at COP21.

item.title: @CARBONE 4 - How to price carbone ?
item.description: After graduation, I have joined a consulting firm Carbone 4, specialised in climate change strategy. One of the three mission for a water actor is carbon price and its strategic involvement for future law appliance.

item.title: @POPUPURBAIN - Sephora is taking Belleville, does it mean the end of it ?
item.description: Web article written during 2015 for a consulting office called pop-up urbain specialised in urbain foresight and social-media.

item.title: @SORBONNE- Le microcrédit encourage t'il l'éducation ?
item.description: Master's thesis written during my master's degree in applied economics at Sorbonne University.

item.title: @MAYOR OF PARIS - How do we access water in Paris ?
item.description: The Mairie de Paris is working to reduce the sensation of heat (cf. urban heat island phenomena) and has initiated a feasibility study for access to water with a group from the Paris 1 sustainable development master's programme in order to quantify the exact needs. This study contributed to the opening in 2017 of the innovative open-water swimming pool at the Villette basin.

item.title: @SNCF - How to size new line regarding Paris' evolution in 2030 ?
item.description: Internship made at SNCF in collaboration with l'Institut de la Région Île-de-France regarding the impact of 2 new lines, today and in 2030.
